<base target="_parent">

```{r}
tryCatch(
    plot_timeseries(
        csv_tv  = "http://oceanview.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/tabledap/FED_Rockfish_Catch.csvp?time,catch&latitude%3E=35.5&latitude%3C=38&common_name=%22PACIFIC%20HAKE%22",
        title   = "Pacific Hake Abundance",
        y_label = "Count",
        skip    = 0,
        filter  = NULL,
        col_t   = "time (UTC)",
        col_y   = "catch",
        group_by= NULL
    ),
    error = function(e) e
)
```
